systemPrinciple: Skill trees to your future selves. Each tree shows where you are, where you're going, and the next conversation to get there.
howToUse: Find a tree that pulls you. Say the activation phrase. We continue from where you are.
browsableView: skill-trees.md — Open this file to browse all trees

conversationStarters.description: Just say one of these to continue learning

updateProtocol: Add new trees when new domains are captured. Update position when knowledge is demonstrated. Advance nodes when conversations happen.

verificationProtocol.principle: No advancement without demonstrated knowledge. The tree reflects what you KNOW, not what you were exposed to.

unknown_to_curious.requirement: User asks about it or expresses interest
unknown_to_curious.verification: automatic — the question itself is proof

curious_to_understood.requirement: User can explain it back correctly
curious_to_understood.verification: teach-back prompt: 'In your own words, what's the key idea?'

understood_to_strong.requirement: User can apply, connect, or teach it
understood_to_strong.verification: application prompt: 'How would this apply to [scenario]?' or 'How does this connect to [domain]?'

autonomousUpdates.reality: Updates happen as part of conversation flow

dataFlow.filter: future-selves.md (which future self is this building toward?)

autonomousUpdates.updateRule: When learning-queue.json changes, skill-trees.md MUST be updated to match. They are not independent files.

learningDecay.principle: Understanding can degrade. Nodes can move BACKWARD, not just forward.
reVerificationTriggers: User says 'I don't remember how X works'
30+ days since last verification on a node

decayTransitions.strong_to_understood: Can't apply anymore, but can still explain
